1491420.name: OhShape - Electro Party
1491420.description:
The new "Electro Party" music pack takes you into a wild party with upbeat electronic music, vibrant moving elements, and electricity. A lot of electricity. With the first dark environment, give in to the lights, adrenaline, and dance to powerful tracks such as "PumpUpTheBass" and "Detonate". Let your emotions out, and party with OhShape! This DLC contains a new stage and 9 songs:

-New Dark Stage
-"Show Me" by Tiësto
-"Attack" by Red City Hero
-"Detonate" by Stretched
-"Is This All There" by Arch Tremors
-"Keeping Love Alive" by Guest of Rapture
-"Pump Up The Bass" by Fassounds
-"Radio Love" by Tyler Fiore
-"Save Me" by Kiba
-"The One" by Fassounds
1491420.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 法语, 德语, 繁体中文, 韩语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
